name: The Great Northern War - history of Sweden
name_original: The Great Northern War - history of Sweden
description:
It is the year 1700 and Denmark-Norway, Russia and Poland-Lituania is invading Sweden. You must defend Sweden and prevent them from reaching the capital!

This game was made during a game jam, I didn't have much time to work on this game so I'm sorry for any bugs that i have missed

Controls: use WASD to move,

Attack enemies by being near them, but beware, you will also take damage. 

sometimes healing hearts spawns in northern Sweden, go there to regenerate your health

The goal is to defend Stockholm by defeating the enemies before they reach the city.
